title: Motorists have nighttime sighting on outskirts of Lawrenceville
observed: I seen something tall and black, about 7 feet tall,  run real fast across 12th Street in Lawrenceville about 3 weeks ago.
location_details: What ever it was it came from the left to right by some grain bins across 12th Street. It took just seconds to run across the road going west.  We are rural here at my location.
